title: Wout van Aert’s Vuelta a España Ends in Heartbreak After Crashing Out on Downhill
content:
Van Aert abandons the Vuelta after winning three stages and leading both the green points jersey and King of the Mountains competition.

Read the full article at Wout van Aert’s Vuelta a España Ends in Heartbreak After Crashing Out on Downhill on Velo.
author: ahood
